source_objects.title: Microsoft

items.title: Power-Query M language Programming - Part 1

visible_instructors.title: ajay parmar
visible_instructors.name: ajay
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor - Advance Excel, Excel Vba ,Access, Access Vba

items.headline: Powerquery M code, Powerquery M functions, How to use M code
objectives_summary: We will learn the use of M functions in PowerQuery . M stands for Mash-up language.
You will go beyond front interface and see how we can change powerquery codes the way we want and control the data and shape it up in much better way.

Front End is powerful but it cannot match with the Back end abilities when it comes to data cleaning and structuring the way you want. So, M langue or M code will make you awesome from every angle in controlling the data.

items.title: Statistical Analysis with Excel 2013 Advanced Skills
items.headline: Master statistical analysis with Excel 2013 on your own terms with this one-of-a-kind video training course.
objectives_summary: Learn about the z-Test and the fundamental concepts behind t-tests and how they work.
Learn an Excel function for paired sample testing and the data analysis tool for carrying out t-Tests for paired samples.
You'll be introduced to Analysis of Variance or ANOVA and learn all about a data analysis tool that Excel provides for you to do an analysis of variance.
